title: Does anyone have an idea with unknown error has occurred before the game start?
body:
I just got this issue right before the game start with this message.

"an unknown direct X error has occurred and league of legends cannot start. Please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the manufacturer".

It was totally fine until yesterday, and then the message had just showed up and the game does not start. So i had to reinstall league and update all the drivers, but same thing happened again. 

Also i got 20 mins of leaver buster penalty LOL

does anyone had same experience and how did you guys solved that? Please HELP!

replies.body: With that kind of error message, it sounds like League isn't interacting with your graphics card correctly. Double check that directx is up to date, and if so go through the rest of [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq3) as well. Let me know if that helps or not and I can dig a little deeper.
